title: Augusta County: William Smith Hanger Baylor to Mrs. Baylor, April 22, 1862
summary: Baylor discusses being conferred the "Colonelcy" of the 5th Va., and describes his feelings about the duty that lies before him.
keywords: Troop Movement, Battle Description, Military Authority, Patriotism, Camp Life, Regiment: 5th Va. Inf., Company: none, American Civil War
